12.name: Krytan Explorer
12.description: You've explored the war-torn hills of humanity's home.

bits.text: Harathi Hinterlands: Ruins of Holy Demetra

31.name: Giant Slayer
31.description: The bigger they are, the harder they fall.

52.name: Wurm Slayer
52.description: Slice these slimy things from top to bottom.

116.name: Closer to the Stars
116.description: You follow the tradition of a long line of heroes.
116.requirement: Earn  points in the Hall of Monuments.

203.name: Professor Portmatt's Lab
203.description: Prove your genius. Or ride on someone's coattails.

206.name: Antre of Adjournment
206.description: Find a way to reach the secret hideout of Arcanist Slizz.

241.name: Conqueror
241.description: Win some, lose some; win some more.

407.name: Monthly Kill Variety
407.description: Each profession will find its end with you.

417.name: Disaster Derailed
417.requirement: Help out at Tixx's workshop in Divinity's Reach.

437.name: Daily Mists Guard Killer
437.description: You took down the enemy's guards in the Mists.

467.name: Recycler
467.requirement: Break down items using a salvage kit.

558.name: Master of Baubles, World 1
558.requirement: Collect all of the baubles in World 1, Zone 3 in one playthrough. Baubles from foes aren't counted.

559.name: Doctor of Baubles, World 1
559.requirement: Collect all of the baubles in World 1. Baubles from foes aren't counted.

604.name: Canach Trapper
604.description: Defeat the fugitive Canach in his Southsun lair.

606.name: Lair Light-foot
606.description: Complete Canach's Lair without getting caught in any traps.

609.name: Gossip with Lady Kasmeer
609.description: Speak with Lady Kasmeer Meade on Southsun Cove.

611.name: Briefing by Inspector Kiel
611.description: Speak with Inspector Kiel on Southsun Cove.

623.name: Crab-Carrying Competitor
623.description: Carry the crab in the Southsun Crab Toss.

644.name: Daily WvW Camp Capturer
644.requirement: Capture supply camps for your realm in World versus World.

670.name: Cantle Cache
670.requirement: Loot the Aetherblade Cache in the Hidden Garden in Mount Maelstrom.

768.name: Winner and Champion
768.requirement: Defeat  type of the Queen's Champions.

880.name: She's Over Here!
880.requirement: Meet up with Rox in Sparkfly Fen.

888.name: Here Be Dragons!
888.requirement: Participate in the Tequatl encounter  times.

949.name: Fancy or Forest
949.requirement: Complete either a Caudecus's Manor or Twilight Arbor dungeon (story or explorable).

1106.name: Tower Toxin Cleanser
1106.description: Use antitoxin spray skill to remove toxic pollen from yourself and allies.

1113.name: Tower of Nightmares Survivor
1113.requirement: Survive  chamber in the Tower of Nightmares.

1148.name: Fractal Fortnight: Uncategorized
1148.requirement: You've completed the Uncategorized fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

1210.name: Aftermath Emergency Response
1210.requirement: Remove  conditions from yourself or allies.

1286.name: Yay, Wintersday Presents IV
1286.description: Oooh, I wonder what's in there.

1325.name: Boss Thumper IX
1325.requirement: Participate in either the fight against the twisted marionette in Lornar's Pass or the fight against the great jungle wurms on Bloodtide Coast.

1371.name: Make It Rain
1371.requirement: Purchase an air-strike grenade at the airport and rain destruction from the sky.

1547.name: Shinies in the Sky
1547.requirement: Complete the jumping puzzle in Garnet, Emerald, or Sapphire Sanctum.

1549.name: Advanced Mists Invasion Defender
1549.requirement: Defeat enemy invaders in the Mists.

1551.name: WvW Tournament Contestant
1551.requirement: Enter WvW while the tournament season is active.

1552.name: World Ranker
1552.requirement: Gain  world rank in the Mists.

1582.name: Centaur Culler
1582.requirement: Kill  centaur in the Crown Pavilion.

1819.name: Dancer in the Dark
1819.description: Story Instance: Tracking the Aspect Masters
1819.requirement: Complete Tracking the Aspect Masters after speaking with the challenge mote and activating challenge mode.

1956.name: Daily Snowden Drifts Event Completer
1956.requirement: Complete events in Snowden Drifts in the Shiverpeak Mountains.

1985.name: Daily Shiverpeaks Forager
1985.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
1985.requirement: Gather raw materials by foraging plants in the following Shiverpeak Mountains maps: Wayfarer Foothills, Snowden Drifts, Lornar's Pass, Dredgehaunt Cliffs, Timberline Falls, and Frostgorge Sound.

2033.name: Wintersday Wrecking Ball
2033.description: Nothing a little tape and some glue can't fix.
2033.requirement: Destroy every miniature piece of Tixx's toy diorama in Tixx's Infinirarium. (Dungeon instance only; not in the Toypocalypse activity.)

2040.name: Finders Keepers
2040.description: Your greed ruined someone else's Wintersday. Jerk.
2040.requirement: Pick up a dropped present while escorting a donation dolyak in Divinity's Reach.

2096.name: Daily Warrior or Guardian Winner
2096.requirement: Win  PvP match as a warrior or guardian.

2124.name: Maguuma Trailblazer
2124.description: Thank you for prepurchasing Guild Wars 2: Heart of Thorns.

2160.name: Pact Pilot Protector
2160.requirement: Help the captured Pact pilots escape from Toadstool Mire.

2162.name: Daily Revenant or Ranger Winner
2162.requirement: Win  PvP match as a revenant or ranger.

2180.name: Rodgort I: The Experimental Torch
2180.description: Fire is the most volatile and energetic of the elements. Consign the parts of magical beasts to the flames, and meditate on the flames that result, as you begin your journey to attain the legendary precursor known as Rodgort's Flame.
2180.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

bits.text: Burn a Heart of the Flame Effigy in the cauldron at Division Shrine in Fireheart Rise.
Burn a Heart of an Ember in the cauldron at Division Shrine in Fireheart Rise.
Burn a Heart of a Fire Imp in the cauldron at Division Shrine in Fireheart Rise.
Burn a Heart of a Fire Elemental in the cauldron at Division Shrine in Fireheart Rise.
Burn a Destroyer Lodestone in the cauldron at Division Shrine in Fireheart Rise.
Burn an Essence of Fire Magic in the cauldron at Division Shrine in Fireheart Rise.
Burn Tequatl's Eye in the cauldron at Division Shrine in Fireheart Rise.
Burn Claw of Jormag's Scale in the cauldron at Division Shrine in Fireheart Rise.
Burn the Shatterer's Crystal in the cauldron at Division Shrine in Fireheart Rise.
Burn the Vinewrath's Petals in the cauldron at Division Shrine in Fireheart Rise.
Burn a Heart of the Megadestroyer in the cauldron at Division Shrine in Fireheart Rise.

2188.name: A Fungus Among Us: Silver
2188.requirement: Bounce your way through the checkpoints and across the finish line!

2223.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 26
2223.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2292.name: Highest Gear
2292.description: Watch out for those ancient chess golems. They're known to cheat.

2328.name: Laser Lighter
2328.description: Who doesn't love a laser show?
2328.requirement: Help Splort activate Rata Novan lasers.

2353.name: Master Scrapper
2353.requirement: Completely train the engineer's scrapper elite specialization.

2423.name: Mother of Wyverns
2423.description: Those are her babies and grandbabies you've been killing...
2423.requirement: Defeat the wyvern matriarch after nightfall in Verdant Brink.

2450.name: HOPE I: Research
2450.description: The froglike hylek are Tyria's best alchemists, the masters of potion and poison. Take the role of the apprentice in discovering the secrets of their work to create research, the first step in attaining the Hylek Optimized Projectile Experiment (HOPE).
2450.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

bits.text: Purchased from Atlalli, the Master Alchemist in the Hunting Banks of Timberline Falls.
Speak to Atlalli, the Master Alchemist in the Hunting Banks of Timberline Falls to start the Hylek Poison's Test once you have crafted the Vial of Potent Hylek Poison.
The secrets to crafting a quality hylek poison can be found among the alchemy supplies hidden in the treasure room of the Tears of Itlaocol in Caledon Forest.
Harvested from Veteran Mosquitos in Caledon Forest.
Found growing alone near the vista of Lightfoot Passage in Straits of Devastation.
Found on the Hylek of Morgatl Grounds in Caledon Forest.
Speak to Atlalli, the Master Alchemist in the Hunting Banks of Timberline Falls to start the Hylek Medicine's Test once you have crafted the Vial of Healing Breath.
Recipe purchased from Matlal after successfully helping her collect truffles for her starving tribe in the Eukaryan Caves of Kessex Hills.
Offered for purchase by Cook Huelic after helping the Michotl tribe within the Michoan Marsh of Metrica Province.
Found in the Great Jungle Wurm's chest in the Wychmire Swamp of Caledon Forest.
Purchase from Fiona Hastings in the apiary near Claypool in Queensdale after successfully defending her beehives from hungry bears.
Purchased from Atlalli, the Master Alchemist in the Hunting Banks of Timberline Falls.
Speak with Nochtli in the Prospect Valley of Dry Top about how to find this rare aloe.
Speak to Atlalli, the Master Alchemist in the Hunting Banks of Timberline Falls to start the Sun God's Breath test once you have crafted the Sun God's Breath Flask.
Offered for purchase by Cuadinti after helping him prepare Southwatch Post near the Astrozintli Forelands in Sparkfly Fen.
Found in Champion Mayatl the Fierce's chest near the Temple of Ameyalli in Verdant Brink.
Offered for purchase by Atzintli after helping the Atzintli and Zopatl tribes battle the krait in the Ventry Bay of Caledon Forest.
Attained from the Bugs in the Branches adventure of Jaka Itzel in Verdant Brink by reaching a rank of silver or better.
Harvested from the Bloomhunger in the Swamplands Fractal.
Complete this book by recording the three Hylek Alchemy Chapters in your Hylek Alchemy Apprentice Tome by passing each of Atlalli's tests with the tome in your inventory.

2513.name: Chak Killer—Beginner
2513.requirement: Jump into the pit and kill chak.

2529.name: Mistward Headwrap
2529.requirement: Unlock the rest of the Mistward armor set to earn your headwrap.

bits.text: Defeat the chak gerent in Tangled Depths.
Purchased for crystalline ore in Dragon's Stand.

2549.name: Tarnished Traitor
2549.description: Find this lost Exalted below the city of Tarir.
2549.locked_text: Defeat the tarnished warrior below Tarir.

2555.name: Ultimate Challenge Winner
2555.description: You won all the outpost challenges around Auric Basin.
2555.requirement: Place first in all the outpost challenges around Auric Basin.
2555.locked_text: Win all of the outpost challenges.

2590.name: Fire Jumper
2590.description: You've reached the highest heights and found your flame.
2590.requirement: Use a jump mushroom to gather flamethrower supplies.

2700.name: League Mesmer—Recruit
2700.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Professional—Recruit achievement.
2700.requirement: Win 5 ranked matches as a mesmer.

2731.name: Essence Collector—Elite
2731.description: Completing this achievement awards an item for Path of the Ascension IV: Hymn of Glory.
2731.requirement: Purchase 1 Essence of Success from the League Vendor.

2815.name: Soaring Weapon Collection
2815.requirement: Unlock all  Soaring weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2833.name: Dominator Weapon Collection
2833.requirement: Unlock all  Dominator weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2887.name: Environmental Science 103
2887.requirement: Smash the honeycomb in World 1, Zone 3 of Super Adventure Box.

2916.name: Daily Tier 1 Snowblind
2916.requirement: Complete Snowblind at fractal scale 1 or higher.

2961.name: Daily Tier 2 Swampland
2961.requirement: Complete Swampland at fractal scale 26 or higher.

2984.name: Daily Adventure: On Wings of Gold
2984.requirement: Open the bronze daily reward chest from this adventure!

3044.name: Daily Tier 2 Chaos
3044.requirement: Complete Chaos at fractal scale 26 or higher.

3052.name: Daily Bloodstone Fen Aerial Skill User
3052.requirement: Use unbound magic skills / times while in the air in Bloodstone Fen.

3062.name: Dive Master: Just Dropping By
3062.requirement: Use the diving goggles near the highest floating island.

3070.name: Lost Souls
3070.requirement: Find and defeat the four ghostly champions wandering Bloodstone Fen.

3088.name: Available Guardian
3088.requirement: Defeat the Unbound Guardian deep within the Cavern of Unseen Lights.

3230.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 73
3230.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

3404.name: Draconis Mons Insight: Scalding Gorge
3404.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Draconis Mons.

3434.name: Exfoliating
3434.description: The dead skin comes right off!
3434.requirement: Spend too much time swimming in the boiling sea.

3459.name: Legendary Armorer
3459.description: Owner of some of the rarest items in Tyria.
3459.requirement: Bind  unique legendary Perfected Envoy armor skin.

3500.name: Bloodstone Fen Master
3500.requirement: Collect all  items to prove your mastery over Bloodstone Fen.
3500.locked_text: Acquire a Sentient Seed by combining the four sentient creations from Season 3. Misplaced items can be obtained from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

bits.text: Obtained after defeating ghostly Justiciar Hablion.
Dropped by White Mantle in Bloodstone Fen.
Dropped by jade constructs in Bloodstone Fen.
Dropped by ghosts in Bloodstone Fen.
Dropped by bloodstone elementals in Bloodstone Fen.
Sold by Natto in Bloodstone Fen.
Gathered from unbound magic nodes in Bloodstone Fen.
Obtained by killing enemies with gliding skills in Bloodstone Fen.
Dropped from enemies near unstable rifts.
Obtained after defeating the Unbound Guardian.

3514.name: Daily Siren's Landing: Gambler
3514.description: A chest a day keeps your gold at bay.
3514.requirement: Open one of the chests located within the Mouth of Abaddon.

3607.name: Daily Demolisher
3607.requirement: Defeat the Forged Demolisher near the Mouth of Torment.

3704.name: Elon Riverlands Insight: Pillars of Sovereignty
3704.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in Elon Riverlands.

3711.name: Elon Riverlands Bounty Tour
3711.requirement: Complete a bounty from each bounty board location.

3832.name: Crystal Oasis Griffon Master: Gold
3832.requirement: Fly your griffon through the rings as quickly as you can!

3868.name: Staff of the Lost
3868.requirement: Collect all of the weapon pieces and then forge them together in the fires of a dwarven furnace.

bits.text: Found in a cold room deep inside Derelict Delve.
Found in a lava-covered room deep inside Derelict Delve.
Found in a cobwebbed room deep inside Derelict Delve.
Found in a waterlogged room deep inside Derelict Delve.
A forgotten forge inside the Derelict Delve.

4031.name: Istan Griffon Master: Gold
4031.requirement: Complete the Istan Griffon Master Course.

4098.name: Sandswept Isles Bounty Hunter
4098.requirement: Complete a bounty from each bounty board location.

4139.name: The Specimen Chamber
4139.requirement: Defeat each champion simulacrum in the specimen chamber at least once.

bits.text: Simulacrum of Beyn, Scion of Thorns

4220.name: Silent but Deadly
4220.requirement: Never raise suspicion to the point that champions are deployed against you.

4228.name: Domain of Kourna Insight: Dunlon Springs
4228.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in the Domain of Kourna.

4259.name: Be My Guest
4259.requirement: Bring the battle to a decisive conclusion.

4262.name: Domain of Kourna Griffon Master: Gold
4262.requirement: Earn this achievement by opening the gold chest.

4296.name: Candle in the Wind
4296.requirement: Defeat Windcaller Kieldia with On Fire gambit active.

4309.name: Pirate Punisher
4309.requirement: Complete the second tier of the Queen's Gauntlet.

4383.name: Dark Tools for Dark Times
4383.description: Missing since the final battle with Palawa Joko, this staff is far too powerful a tool of darkness to leave unaccounted for.

bits.text: Destined to fall into your hands once you've fulfilled your role as hero.
Swept into the trove of a crystalline beast.
Koss has long opposed Joko. Appropriate that he carries a keepsake of his fallen foe.
Stolen by one of the hunted.
Everything has a price. Seek the woman who reeks of dirt and death.

4424.name: Claws to the Wall
4424.requirement: Avoid being struck by the Death-Branded Shatterer's claws.

4464.name: Rolling Racer: Infernal Leap
4464.requirement: Complete a lap of the roller beetle race in Mount Maelstrom within the time limit. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

4480.name: Daily Racer: Ghostfire Run
4480.requirement: Complete laps of the roller beetle race in Diessa Plateau. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

4486.name: Orchestral Weapon Collection
4486.requirement: Unlock all  Orchestral weapon skins in your wardrobe.

4518.name: Chasing Tales: Durio the Contemptuous
4518.requirement: Acquire a Dragonsblood pistol and perform tasks to re-create Durio's legend.

bits.text: Acquire the tome entry Chasing Tales: Durio the Contemptuous.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Durio: deed #1.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Durio: deed #2.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Durio: deed #3.
Meet with the spirit of Durio at a heroic font.

4597.name: Chasing Tales: Warrior Poet
4597.requirement: Defeat 30 enemies while wielding a greatsword in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Defeated 30 enemies with a greatsword in Thunderhead Peaks.

4661.name: Burning Forest Slayer
4661.requirement: Slay  foes within the Burning Forest in Dragonfall.

4742.name: The Battle of Dragonfall
4742.requirement: Claim victory in the Battle of Dragonfall.

4753.name: Landfall
4753.requirement: Survey the island formed by Kralkatorrik's fall.

4823.name: Color the Sky
4823.requirement: Set off firework launchers or personal fireworks in Hoelbrak.

4827.name: Dragon Basher
4827.requirement: Complete three daily achievements in the Dragon Bash festival. Completion will earn progress in the Party Commander achievement, located in the Dragon Bash Feats achievement tab.

4850.name: (Annual) Color the Sky
4850.requirement: Use firework launchers or set off personal fireworks in Hoelbrak. This achievement can be completed once per year.

4897.name: Endless Ocean Weapon Collection
4897.requirement: Unlock all  Endless Ocean weapon skins in your wardrobe.

4953.name: Grothmar Legionnaire
4953.requirement: Complete daily achievements in Grothmar Valley.

5016.name: Junior Investigator
5016.requirement: Assist Investigator Eleni in gathering evidence of a massacre in Bjora Marches.

5074.name: Mercy of the Toymaker
5074.description: A special gift for a hardworking toymaker's apprentice.

5153.name: Eat a Tasty Cake
5153.description: A perfectly-frosted treat to get your adventure off on the right foot.
5153.requirement: Eat a Tasty Cake, which can be purchased from low-level karma merchants in Plains of Ashford, Wayfarer Foothills, Queensdale, Caledon Forest, and Metrica Province.

5161.name: League Slayer—Conquest Season Twenty-One
5161.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during Conquest Season Twenty-One.

5176.name: Strike While the Crystal Is Hot
5176.requirement:
Collect 100 Misty Cape Scraps.
Misty Cape Scraps are awarded from Strike Missions, Daily Strike achievements, and Weekly Emissary Chests in Eye of the North.
5176.locked_text: Complete a Steel Warband Footsteps achievement, and then confer with Crystallographer Smoxxi.

5197.name: Spa Day
5197.description: Sneak in some R&R when Ryland's not looking. Don't forget the mud mask and cucumber slices.
5197.requirement: Sit in the hot springs after completing the Steel Warband's mission.

5206.name: Weapons of Steel
5206.requirement: Acquire all 5 of the Blood Legion weapons used by the Steel Warband.

bits.text: Found inside an Emissary Chest in the Eye of the North after completing a Steel Warband vision.
Found inside an Emissary Chest in the Eye of the North after completing a Steel Warband vision.
Found inside an Emissary Chest in the Eye of the North after completing a Steel Warband vision.
Found inside an Emissary Chest in the Eye of the North after completing a Steel Warband vision.
Found inside an Emissary Chest in the Eye of the North after completing a Steel Warband vision.

5245.name: Master Diplomat
5245.description:
Story Instance: Pointed Parley

It's like herding cats, but the cats carry flamesaws.
5245.requirement: Find a balance between Malice and Smodur by not favoring one over the other during the war council.

5257.name: Daily Drizzlewood Coast Saboteur
5257.requirement: Complete a Destroy the Dominion Comm Tower event at Leadfoot Village or Vloxen Mines.

5269.name: Special Mission: Clear the Fort
5269.requirement: Defeate  Dominion charr in Fort Defiance in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5296.name: Daily Drizzlewood Coast Siege of Wolf's Crossing
5296.requirement: Participate in a successful siege of Wolf's Crossing.

5297.name: Cache Hunter
5297.requirement: Defeat all 10 cache keepers in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5387.name: Fearless Diver
5387.requirement: Use diving goggles to dive off a cliff next to the highest waterfall.

5394.name: Tribune Slayer
5394.requirement: Defeat each of the Dominion tribunes.

5418.name: Special Mission: Apply Directly to Forehead
5418.requirement: Apply defensive boons to  allies with the Medizooka.

5423.name: Spiritual Renewal
5423.requirement: Meet Owl Shaman Garon at locations sacred to Owl to revitalize his faith in her renewal.
5423.locked_text: To unlock this collection, find Owl Shaman Garon at the Eye of the North.

bits.text: Speak with Owl Shaman Garon at the Eye of the North.
Help Owl Shaman Garon near the Owl Lodge in Snowden Drifts.
Help Owl Shaman Garon by the lost shrine to Owl in Lornar's Pass.
Help Owl Shaman Garon at the Lost Spirits Hallow in Hoelbrak.
Help Owl Shaman Garon at his home in Cragstead.
Help Owl Shaman Garon at Elder's Vale in Frostgorge Sound.
Help Owl Shaman Garon at the Sanctum of the Wild in North Drizzlewood Coast.
Speak with Owl Shaman Garon one last time.

5425.name: Daily Drizzlewood Coast Arena of the Wolverine
5425.requirement: Complete the Arena of the Wolverine adventure in Northern Drizzlewood Coast.

5449.name: Daily Tier 2 Sunqua Peak
5449.requirement: Complete Sunqua Peak at fractal scale 26 or higher.

5507.name: Daily Deldrimor Special
5507.description: The Stone Summit were vile, but they were kin. Putting them to rest is a kindness.

5541.name: Dragon Slayer Weapon Collector
5541.requirement: Unlock  Dragon Slayer weapon skins in your wardrobe.

5681.name: (Weekly) World 2 Replay
5681.description: Weekly achievement. Progress resets on Monday morning.
5681.requirement: Complete Zone 1, Zone 2, and Zone 3 in World 2.

5720.name: Woodland Management: Ember Bay
5720.requirement: Log wood  times in Ember Bay.

5778.name: Crop Harvester: Draconis Mons
5778.requirement: Harvest plants  times in Draconis Mons.

5829.name: Return to Silverwastes 1
5829.requirement: Complete  Return to Echoes of the Past and Tangled Paths achievements.

5952.name: Second Response: Bloodtide Coast
5952.requirement: Complete the Bloodtide Coast Dragon Response Mission.

5991.name: Return to Bjora Marches 1
5991.requirement: Complete  Return to Whisper in the Dark achievements.

6081.name: A Woman of Culture
6081.requirement: Find all the readable books in Joon's mansion.

6188.name: Weekly New Kaineng City Jade Treasure Recovery
6188.description: Bring recovered treasures to Myung-Hee, Keeper of the Jade Vault.
6188.requirement: Complete Kaineng Blackout in New Kaineng City.

6199.name: Old Friends
6199.requirement: Chaperone Gorrik as he meets with Ankka.

6229.name: For the Forest!
6229.requirement: Successfully infiltrate the Speakers, keeping their confidence while sabotaging their efforts.

bits.text: Free a spirit from an urn.
Swipe a piece of confiscated jade tech.
Destroy a piece of confiscated jade tech.
Plant a piece of confiscated jade tech on a Speaker.
Speak to the undercover Spirit Keeper to disable a ward.

6255.name: Commander Be Quick
6255.description: Avoided a grisly fate with expediency.
6255.requirement: Defeat Void Ishan before the timer runs out.

6300.name: Fueled by Elder Dragons
6300.requirement: Charge each Elder Dragon battery at least once.

6332.name: Master Bladesworn
6332.requirement: Completely train the warrior's bladesworn elite specialization.

6402.name: Avid Dragon's End Fisher
6402.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
6402.requirement: Collect  different fish from the waterways around Dragon's End.

6424.name: Champion Plumber
6424.requirement: Clear  underwater drains in Kaineng City.

6460.name: Troubles from the Deep
6460.description: The duality of water is reflected in Cantha's seas. They nurture the land's inhabitants with food sources and trade routes, yet harbor threats of naga and Unchained Risen within their depths.
6460.requirement: Successfully complete events involving the naga and Unchained in Seitung Province.

bits.text: Defend the Ministry forces retaking Usoku's Watchtower.
Gather supplies and defend the tech as they repair the North Peninsula fallen mech.
Disrupt the Unchained ritual in North Peninsula.
Defend and repair the Haiju Cove water purifiers.
Defend the village's supplies from naga raiders in the Eastern Wilds.
Defeat the naga tide priest in the Eastern Wilds.

6527.name: Leaps Abound
6527.requirement: Defeat the Echo without dying or taking damage from Tormenting Wave.

6537.name: League Slayer—Conquest Season Thirty-Two
6537.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-Two.

6581.name: Crafting Items
6581.requirement:
Craft  item.

<c=@reminder>Items can be crafted at crafting stations in cities and guild halls once you've been trained by an appropriate master craftsman. Crafting uses the crafting materials you collect from gathering nodes and defeated enemies as you explore the world.</c>

6590.name: Aurene's Facet of Plant
6590.requirement: Aid Leivas in discovering a new form for your Aurene-based legendary weapon.

bits.text: Speak with Leivas to purchase enough Elder Dragon scale splinters to form a scale fragment.
Purify the scale fragment by successfully defeating the legendary wyvern patriarch in Verdant Brink.
Acquire a completed memory of Mordremoth by collecting enough memory fragments of Elder Dragons.
Defeat the octovine while wielding an Aurene-based legendary weapon.
Purify the lingering Mordrem aether at one of Aurene's focusing crystals located at the Inner Chamber in Tarir.
Return to Leivas to purchase an uncharged fragment.

6609.name: Defeating the Risen
6609.requirement: Defeat  Risen enemy in Mount Maelstrom and Sparkfly Fen.

6621.name: Defeating World Bosses I
6621.requirement:
Defeat  of the world bosses in Queensdale, Wayfarer Foothills, Metrica Province, or Caledon Forest.

<c=@reminder>World bosses are challenging events that appear at specific times of day across Tyria. Defeat them to receive chests containing rare equipment and crafting materials. </c>

6787.name: Speed over Size
6787.requirement: Complete one of the Twisted Marionette's platform encounters without being hit by the marionette's attacks.

6840.name: League Slayer—Conquest Season Thirty-Six
6840.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-Six.

6870.name: Whiffing Wanderer
6870.requirement: Defeat the ravenous wanderer without being hit by area attacks too many times.

6883.name: Gorgeous Live Stage
6883.requirement: Participate in the fashion show in Lion's Arch, either from the audience or the stage!

6948.name: Jade Sea Legs
6948.requirement: Complete the Silent Surf fractal without any assistance from Captain Thess.

6958.name: League Slayer—3v3 Season Nine
6958.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during 3v3 Season Nine.

6989.name: Zojja's Journal: Devastated Garenhoff
6989.requirement: Collect all of Zojja's journal pages in the Devastated Garenhoff fractal.
6989.locked_text: Unlock by starting the Zojja's Journal collection.

bits.text: Help the villagers in Devastated Garenhoff.
Page Location: Devastated Garenhoff, resting near docks.
Page Location: Devastated Garenhoff, where the Arcane Eye watches all.
Page Location: Devastated Garenhoff, where a proud tree stands vigilant.

7021.name: Skyscale Target Practice in Skywatch Archipelago: Master
7021.description: Proof that you and your skyscale killed it!
7021.requirement: Finish the Skyscale Target Practice in Skywatch Archipelago adventure with all targets destroyed.

7025.name: Sempiternal Solidifying Strength
7025.description: "Don't underestimate Mabon's kind heart, Wayfinder. Last we sparred before the ward, his upperhand knocked my conciousness right in two."
7025.requirement: Successfully complete events in the Bastion of Strength.

bits.text: Aid the Astral Ward in defending or retaking the camp.
Help Galrath prepare spells for the fight against the Kryptis.
Use the Grimoire of the Arcane to defeat the Kryptis.
Assist Vanak in completing the group spell.

7653.name: Looking Down from the Edge
7653.requirement: Jump off the high branches into the water near the northern beacon.

7654.name: Hero's Origin: Metrica Province
7654.requirement:
Complete events in Metrica Province in the Maguuma Jungle.

<c=@reminder>You can find events while exploring the world. Events are marked by an orange circle on your map when you're nearby.</c>

7658.name: Jump Start: Local Hero
7658.requirement: Complete any Hero's Origin achievement in the New Hero Jump Starter category.

7694.name: Inner Nayos Insight: Lost Altar
7694.requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in Inner Nayos.

7767.name: Plundering the Sky Pirates (Weekly)
7767.requirement: Loot the final treasure chest in the Aetherblades' secret base in Gendarran Fields.

7835.name: Tentacle Takedown
7835.description: <c=flavor>Put them down, Nourys. Bad Nourys! Bad!</c>
7835.requirement: Defeat tentacles of Nourys during events while protecting Koris and Eppie.

7850.name: Knowledge Is Power
7850.requirement: Speak with Ramses and Galrath to learn more about the situation.

7916.name: League Conqueror—Conquest Season Forty-One
7916.requirement: Win  ranked matches during Conquest Season Forty-One.

7934.name: Ultimate Hunter
7934.requirement: Win  rated arena game as a ranger.

7974.name: Fort Aspenwood Veteran
7974.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8053.name: Consternation with Conri
8053.description: Why does Conri sound like he wants to sell me a used jade bot?
8053.requirement: Use the /upset emote near Conri to let him know how you really feel about his sales tactics.

8086.name: Crystal Desert Veteran
8086.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8207.name: Social Distancing
8207.requirement: Do not spread the rot to other players when you contract it.

8233.name: (Repeatable) Lowland Shore: Journeykin Outpost Renown Heart
8233.requirement: Successfully complete the Journeykin Outpost Renown Heart on  unique days.

8256.name: Event Collection: Northeast Janthir Syntri
8256.requirement:
Participate in successful events around Stricken Plains, Landfall, and Tumultuous Sea.

(Some events can count toward multiple achievements.)

bits.text: Defend and repair lightning rods with scrap from enemies. (Event 1 of 2)
Collect jars and fill them with lightning then deposit them in drop-off locations. (Event 2 of 2)
Kill the giant crab terrorizing the shore.
Clean up and turn in debris collected from the shore and enemies. (Event 1 of 2)
Paint titan footprints and bring them to Running Colors.

8353.name: Lightning Defense
8353.requirement: Prevent the lightning rods from being destroyed.

8401.name: Revenge of Kralkatorrik (Weekly)
8401.requirement: Claim victory in the Battle of Dragonfall.

8414.name: Renowned Hero: Thunderhead Peaks (Weekly)
8414.requirement: Complete renown hearts in Thunderhead Peaks.

8645.name: (Daily) Choya Carnival
8645.requirement: While under the effects of a Spiked Choya Psionic Tonic, complete the hardest fractal you can.

8656.name: Café Coordination
8656.requirement: Place the Café Register decoration in your homestead and try it out.

8714.name: Legendary Backpack and Glider: Orrax
8714.requirement: Bind the legendary backpack and glider Orrax Manifested.

8771.name: Titan Terminus
8771.description: No creature too legendary, no challenge too...challenging.
8771.requirement: Earn gold rank in Convergences with challenge mode active for all legendary creatures.
